Content: Fragmented visions flash through your mind. A message from Lucia comes through—and that's when it hits you that the two of you have made plans to watch the Froggie movie together today.
You must have forgotten some things because of how swamped you've been with missions lately. Free time is precious. What better way is there to spend watching a movie with Lucia?

The staff explains how the Immersion Projector works. While the experience might differ slightly from how things happen in the original film, the opportunity to step into the movie world firsthand is still a rare pleasure.
The dream-like scenes from the movie linger in your mind. At Lucia's suggestion, the two of you head to the nearby Kowloong Restaurant to rest and clear your heads.

A strange voice echoes in your mind and announces the number of people in line before the server does. The wait is too long, so you and Lucia decide to sit and wait for a while at Kuroro Coffee next door.
The voice appears again, this time precisely explaining why the barista's latte art failed. What on earth is happening?
Lucia notices you're not feeling well and suggests you head back to the rest area early to get some rest.
It's the same weird dream again, except you're seeing things more clearly this time. When you wake up, you see you've received a message from Lucia—identical to the one from yesterday, word for word.
Everything seems to have reset, but the number of paper-folded clovers has gone from one to two.
Just like Froggie in the story, you're caught in a time loop. You figured that you'd probably need to fulfill Lucia's wish to break free of the loop, based on the movie's plot.
You stick by Lucia as he goes through all sorts of different hairstyles.
At Kuroro Coffee's interactive event, you make Lucia a coffee with a clover drawing. After a short break, the two of you prepare to head out to try the goodies of Kowloong you've been craving.
Kowloong Restaurant's new dishes certainly live up to their reputation. You savor every bite of the delicious meal with Lucia.
As night falls, Lucia reveals herself to you.
Everything resets to the past once more. The number of paper-folded clovers has changed from two to three. The cycle continues.
Lucia must have wanted you to tell her everything—so you should tell her everything you've been through and what you're facing.
Lucia trusts you through and through. Seeing that the original "Froggie's Day" might harbor new clues, you know you should keep looking into it.
With a staff member's assistance, you prepare to experience the story from the original film. You hope to walk away with some useful information by the end of it.
"A clover that gathers shared wishes can bring forth miracles." After some thought, the two of you decide to create a unique memory that belongs only to the two of you.

The World Government Association of Art's "Dreamweaver" perfectly meets your needs. After some negotiation, Lucia and you secure priority access to the device. The two of you head back to the lounge to use it.
The keywords used dictate the shaping of the dream space. "Hillside covered in pink blossoms," "beach and ocean," "fireworks"—these are the elements of the magical place Lucia and you want to create.
"Are you ready?" Let's step right into this ideal dream that belongs to us.
Everything before you meets your ideal vision perfectly—except Lucia isn't here. You know you want to go to look for her.
Finally, the two of you meet at the seaside. You seem to recognize the person standing before you, but you're slightly unsure. She seems as familiar to you as she does unfamiliar.

You aren't quite sure how to preserve these beautiful moments, but you have, fortunately, been granted access to the floating camera feature in the "Dreamweaver." The photos taken will become a shared "oath" between the two of you that bears witness to all your shared wishes and memories.
The coast, fireworks, and us. All of these have come together—after the camera's countdown freeze—to create a moment more romantic than anything else in the world.

The two of you take a brief rest under a cherry blossom tree, where Lucia crafts a cherry blossom crown with her own hands. As a gift in return, you make her a clover ring and gently slip it onto her finger.
The fading fireworks are a sign that your time here has come to an end. As Lucia and you walk along the shore, the two of you discuss what comes next.
"This wish will become the force that drives us forward, so long as we're always here for each other." Let's embrace this belief together and face the cycle's end.

The dream reaches its end as the "Dreamweaver" begins to collapse around the two of you. The two of you, with your hands intertwined, must now face an inevitable temporary separation. But no matter which path awaits, you're sure you'll see each other again.
Waking up to Lucia's voice, you find yourself back in the lounge again. The cycle has ended.

The World Government Association of Art offers to gift the photos from the "Dreamweaver" as compensation. Lucia and you create a shared album, ready to store your beautiful memories together in the future.
You and Lucia find yourselves in the world of the movie. Someone seems to be waiting for you up ahead.
According to Froggie, heavy rain is coming soon. Hurry up and gather some flowers, grass, and twigs if you don't want to get soaked. Froggie will use these to craft a flowery umbrella.

Froggie is trapped in a time loop and hopes to grow a miracle four-leaf clover to wish for freedom. Froggie needs dewdrops that form when wishes come true to grow this special clover. Froggie is missing one last drop. Help Froggie collect it!
With help from you and Lucia, Froggie has successfully found the golden firefly. Deliver it to Mama Mole to secure the final Wish Dewdrop.

Froggie successfully grows the miraculous clover and finally sees the sun coming out. But the final scene of the movie... seems to have hit you with a powerful sense of deja vu. You feel like you have seen it in a dream.

Everything else in the room remains exactly as it was yesterday morning, save for the fact that the number of the four-leaf clovers is different now. You decide to meet up with Lucia first, unsure what to make of this situation.
Lucia wants to try some new hairstyles. The stylist at Galaxy Fashion gives the pair a warm welcome and happily agrees to suggest a few suitable looks for Lucia.
It's a little too early to head over to Kowloong Restaurant. Kuroro Coffee seems to be hosting a community experience event—let's make that our next stop.
In the story, Froggie eventually fails to grow the miracle four-leaf clover and falls asleep dejected. A villager comes by and secretly places something beside the sleeping frog.
The townsfolk fold numerous paper clovers for Froggie by hand. Nurtured by everyone's sincere wishes, the miracle clover quietly blooms amidst gentle blessings.
You meet with Lucia and decide to visit the newly built "Terminal Beacon" in the Commercial District to gather data and wait for Liv's call.
When you finish bringing Lucia up to speed about the communication details, the two of you head to your destination together to register for the event and collect your invitations.

A staff member tells you that you'll be able to earn an extra prize by completing the hidden missions, and you know you want to do that for Lee. On your way, you run into Vera, and the two of you head to Kuroro Coffee together.
You meet up with Liv at Kuroro Coffee, where you arranged the task allocation for the hidden mission in advance.

Through chatting with Laydon, you learn that Ross has fallen on hard times recently, and you promise to help out later. After collecting the souvenir, you prepare to leave and continue with the hidden missions.
You take photos at the public navigation points for the photo check-in mission.
At Lucia and Liv's suggestion, you keep one of the check-in photos as a special keepsake.
You notice that Ross isn't doing well.
Through a conversation with Ed, an employee at the cafe, you learn that Ross is being harassed by unknown individuals.
Haley, another employee, has also noticed what's happening to Ross and feels quite worried.
Ross confirms that the cafe is facing a hostile takeover attempt and asks you to help with its management.
You discuss countermeasures with Jason, the cafe's humanoid AI.
Pete, the mastermind behind the hostile takeover, makes an appearance. You stand firm in the face of his threats.
Ross shows the threatening letter to you.
Ross is terrified because of the threatening letter.
Billy, one of Pete's underlings, tries to smear the cafe's reputation by fabricating food safety concerns, but Haley exposes his scheme using security camera footage.
Jason reports the cafe's operational status to you and suggests meeting with Maru Bear, the cafe's mascot, to discuss how to launch an investigation against Pete.
Maru Bear monitors the suspicious customers and determines that Pete has sent new underlings to disrupt the cafe's operations.
Maru Bear promises to launch an investigation and asks you to focus on running the cafe.
Maru Bear briefs you on Ross' current situation and suggests starting with the threatening letter to gather evidence.
You and Maru Bear examine the handwriting on the letter. The handwriting is determined to be Pete's and submitted as a piece of evidence of Pete's threatening behavior.
With the crisis behind them, the cafe's staff celebrates their victory.
Ross and Jason express their heartfelt gratitude to you.
After speaking with the psychologist and learning about Rhea's amnesia, you decide to follow the doctor's advice and start by having casual conversations with her.
Perhaps because of their shared status, Rhea feels comfortable opening up to you.
Based on Rhea's current condition, the doctor provides a treatment plan.
You ask Ross to prepare a beverage that Rhea used to enjoy.
All items needed for the treatment have been prepared, and following the doctor's recommendation, you will personally deliver them to Rhea.
Through the healing power of recovered memories and your attentive guidance, Rhea shows significant improvement.
A strange Kuroro suddenly darts out from the roadside. You manage to subdue it and report the incident to the staff.
The first glitched Kuroro is an exceptionally narcissistic character who wants you to take a flattering photo of it.
The Narcissistic Kuroro is thoroughly pleased with the photos you took.
The second malfunctioning Kuroro seems to particularly idolize you. Using a fingerprint "autograph" as bait, you successfully recover it.
The third malfunctioning Kuroro is a competitive gaming ace. It will only leave once its record in Space Leap has been broken.
After recovering all the malfunctioning Kuroros in the area, you hand them over to the staff member who came to collect them.
Those moments of clarity came from what had brought this wish to life.
We've already selected the photos from before, but there's still space left in the album. Let's head back to the "Dreamweaver" together and fill those empty pages.
You and Lucia participated in Stella Brew's "Toast This Evening" event, where they crafted a unique drink for each other.
Appointed as Chief Commissioner of the square, you decide to visit the location in search of new clues before the inauguration ceremony.
The mysterious figure, nervous, has lost the paper version of "the list."
Celica and you devise a strategy to counter the Flourish Guild.
At the inauguration ceremony, you announce the formation of a property owners' committee to oppose the Flourish Guild, led by Councilor Hertha.
Preparing to begin the first round of construction.
Take a walk through the outer square while the council prepares materials for the next round of construction.
You run into Lucia at Inn Elite.
A dispute has broken out between Ocean Heart and Akdilek. You've accepted a commission from both parties to investigate the truth behind the theft of Akdilek's spices.
Lucia's analysis suggests that the spice thief must be either a human or a Construct.
Lucia and you gather nearby surveillance data and summon three suspects for questioning.
Jos turns out to be the mastermind behind the letters. She quickly flees the scene when people find out she's one behind the letters.
Jos sent her thugs to ambush you, but Lucia arrived just in time to take them down. The two of you found some of the missing spices on Jos, which goes to show that she was the thief all along.

Together, the two of you help resolve the conflict between Ocean Heart and Akdilek. With the crisis behind, Lucia and you make plans to attend the celebration together on the day the open-air square's development is completed.
You've received a notification from Celica. Time to find her to begin the next phase of construction.
Let's head to the square to inspect the marquee.

The marquee suddenly malfunctions. By chance, you run into Vera, who's here trying to track down Kurono. The two of you decide to join forces to find out the role the Chamber of Commerce plays in the dealings.
The two of you prepare to visit Cedar Shop to collect the last data batch.

Thanks to Vera's forceful negotiation, Cedar Shop helps collect the final data logs. The area Teddy has mapped out proves too extensive, so the two of you decide to interrogate Jos—whom the two of you captured earlier.

Jos remains tight-lipped, so Vera decides to interrogate her alone. Under Vera's pressure, Jos eventually spills the Chamber's secret meeting location. The two of you believe it has to be right under Stella Brew and prepare to investigate it yourselves.
The manager of Stella Brew opens the door to the underground warehouse for the two of you.
A continuously updated merchandise procurement log.
Vera discovers hidden cameras monitoring the open-air square.
The two meet at the last gate, where they hear Hertha's voice coming from within.
The two successfully apprehend Hertha, but Mark, the chairman of the Flourish Guild, had already distanced himself from her. It seems it will take a little longer to take down the entire operation.
Having destroyed the malicious program in the Kurono Commercial District, Vera and you make plans to attend the celebration together on the day the square's development is completed.
You've received a notification from Celica. Time to find her to begin the next phase of construction.
Go and enjoy the festival with Lucia.
Ocean Heart and Akdilek are hosting a joint event. They've invited Lucia and you to take a commemorative photo together.
Go and enjoy the festival with Vera.
Vera and you mix drinks for each other and share some unforgettable moments together.
After resting, a message from Lucia arrives on your terminal.
